divs: sighting detailsmoving in formation east to west in triangle pattern. airline traffic almost always north and south into and out of orlando. cape canaveral approximately 50 miles due east. three reddish\orange glowing objects moving across sky in a triangular pattern with two objects followed by a third. disappeared into clouds. was in car when wife spotted them. stopped car, got out and observed strange lights moving across sky not making any noise. recorded lights on iphone video. almost looked like large flares but they were much too large. sky was dark as nighttime had commenced. was stunned by the sighting.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Lake Mary
